image:image.image:title: Pyaar Yaa Paap S01 (2025) Full Series
image:image.image:caption: Death wears many faces when born of love and betrayal. In this anthology, each standalone story-from grandiose relationships to hidden affairs-unfolds in murder mystery style, probing the blurred lines between affection and obsession.

image:image.image:title: Playdate (2025) Hindi Dubbed Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: Brian has just been fired from his job. He becomes a stay-at-home dad. He accepts a playdate invitation from another stay-at-home dad who turns out to be a loose cannon.

image:image.image:title: Sem Break (2025) Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: Three sexy mermaids go on a sizzling Vietnam trip that turns dark when a friend is found dead.

image:image.image:title: Marked Men Rule - Shaw (2025) Hindi Dubbed Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: Shaw has loved Rule since she saw him, but Rule doesn't see her as a suitable match, but a night of drinking and secrets leads them to question if they can be together without ruining their relationship...or each other.

image:image.image:title: Into The Deep (2025) Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: Pirates on the hunt for sunken drugs kidnap a boat of tourists and force them to dive into shark infested waters to retrieve the contraband.

image:image.image:title: Hitman 2 (2025) Hindi Dubbed Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: After a successful first season, Webtoon 'Agent Jun' is about to begin its second season. Out of ideas, Jun uses an anonymous email plot in his Webtoon, only to see real-life terrorist attacks resembling the story unfold.

image:image.image:title: Predator Badlands (2025) Hindi Dubbed Full Movie

image:image.image:caption: A brilliant but egotistical scientist brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

image:image.image:title: Mango (2025) Hindi Dubbed Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: Lærke, an ambitious hotel manager, is sent to Malaga to develop a hotel on Alex's mango farm. Lærke's daughter joins, expecting a rare holiday. Unexpected feelings arise between Lærke and Alex, forcing them to make life-altering choices.

image:image.image:title: Assassin (2025) Hindi Dubbed Full Movie
image:image.image:caption: In 1932 Shanghai, a resistance leader and a gangster join forces to eliminate a Japanese military strategist. Their mission leads to violent encounters, public uprising, and ultimate sacrifice in the fight for freedom.

image:image.image:title: Saira Khan Case (2025) Full Movie | Crime Thriller
image:image.image:caption: After a cruel talaq abroad, a resilient mother defies oppressive laws and fights back through India's secular courts-battling for her children, her rights, and her dignity in a powerful journey of justice and courage. Based on true events, this courtroom drama explores women's rights in modern India.

image:image.image:title: Ek Chatur Naar (2025) Full Movie | Comedy Drama
image:image.image:caption: Set in a quirky small-town India, a seemingly naive yet razor-sharp woman outsmarts everyone. Ambitious and cunning, she seizes a lucrative chance, only to face unpredictable twists and darkly comic turns that test her wits at every step.

image:image.image:title: Controll (2025) Full Movie | Action Drama
image:image.image:caption: An IMA cadet investigates his brother-in-law's suicide, discovering he was victim of a scam network. With his academy friends, he works to expose the organization and deliver justice.

image:image.image:title: Half CA S02 (2025) Full Tv Series
image:image.image:caption: Two CA Aspirants from two different ends of the spectrum of the course, Archie and Niraj embark on the journey of one of the toughest courses and face the obstacles it has to offer.
